title: LoL, did they change the Elder Drake Mission?
body: Before you had to defeat one elder drake once. Now it's defeat an elder/play two games. I guess it's so rare to reach late game nowadays that they had to change it XD

Doable yes but it wasn't exactly a satisfying condition. Missions should either be super easy to just coax you into playing, which is the case for league, or really wacky and creative, easy or not. That one was just weird. What I got was "snowball the game but don't end just bm until you can get Elder" or "hard lose drake advantage, stall and then rush or steal elder". I mean, that's a pretty shitty condition to meet.
Whats late game?

I like how people look at this and think "Wow, what a mission to have because of our shitty game state", instead of "Wow, what a shitty mission to have in our games." The mission was changed because Elder Dragon isn't supposed to be something that people get regularly, and is doubly bad since teams most likely to get Elder Dragon are the teams that are already winning and far ahead, meaning it's far more likely for them to end before seeing it. 

It'd be no different than making a mission that says get 300 CS in a single game. Sure, it's possible for some games, but without deliberately prolonging the game to get to that amount, the chances of it happening in a single game is rare. Not because of the game state, but because of the liklihood that someone who'd have the best chance getting to 300, is already in a state of winning and could end the game before it happens.

Every thing you just pointed out points to the Game state. 

pretty much the game state is Just to Snow ball damage happy, in fact most games are over by the time one team gets the dragon Soul. 
after that teams will usually get the baron which is usually already spawned and boom games over. 

The State of the Game just doesn't support this mission,   which was why it had to be changed.
